name: Suck it up (itch) (teamhaardvuur, Redbandit)
description:
Description

Suck it Up is a local multiplayer partygame. Pick a tree, grow your roots and destroy the ones of your friends! Suck up the most water and make sure you're the first tree to grow large and beautiful. You dont need friends in this game... Water is your real friend.

Instructions:

You need 4 controllers to play.

Make sure the screen resolution is set at 1920x1080

Suck it Up was made by: 

Gijs Sickenga 

Tom Bosman 

Hugo de Kruijf 

Ricardo Desmedt 

Kay van der Lans 

Bob van Unen 

Sanne Corino

Rik Langeveld
